name: part_013
file: tmp_【#つながるホロライブDAY2】hololive 3rd fes. Link Your Wish【チラ見せ】 [LgyXzn0k0MA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Prism Melody' by various hololive members.
Transition scene with upbeat music and group introductions on screen.
Aki Rosenthal, Shiranui Flare, and Yukihana Lamy address the audience on stage.
Performance of the song 'Inochi no Akari' by Aki Rosenthal, Shiranui Flare, and Yukihana Lamy.

subtitles.original: 君に会いたくてやってきたんだ
subtitles.english: I came here because I wanted to see you

subtitles.original: みんなで歌おう
subtitles.english: Let's all sing together

subtitles.original: 終わらないメロディー
subtitles.english: The unending melody

subtitles.original: きらめきに乗って
subtitles.english: Riding on the sparkle

subtitles.original: 届いてるかな　私の声 (My voice)
subtitles.english: Is it reaching you? My voice (My voice)

subtitles.original: 届けたいのは　君に笑顔
subtitles.english: What I want to deliver is a smile to you

subtitles.original: 理想と遠さに　悔しくて
subtitles.english: I was frustrated by the distance from my ideals

subtitles.original: みんなと泣き笑ったね
subtitles.english: We cried and laughed together, didn't we?

subtitles.original: ぎゅっとぎゅっとぎゅっとぎゅっと　全て抱きしめて
subtitles.english: Tightly, tightly, tightly, tightly, embracing everything

subtitles.original: 一緒に行こう　どこまでも (Alright!) 準備はOK?
subtitles.english: Let's go together, no matter how far (Alright!) Are you ready?

subtitles.original: 進め希望の道を　1・2・3
subtitles.english: Advance on the path of hope, 1, 2, 3

subtitles.original: きらめきライター
subtitles.english: Sparkling Writer

subtitles.original: 好きな気持ち　カラフルに奏でたいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to perform my feelings of love colorfully

subtitles.original: 最高の場所　最高のみんなと
subtitles.english: In the best place, with the best people

subtitles.original: ここにいるよ　幻なんかじゃない
subtitles.english: I'm here, it's not a phantom

subtitles.original: 君の心が　幸せに染まるように
subtitles.english: So that your heart may be dyed in happiness

subtitles.original: 重ねていくハーモニー　きらめき纏って
subtitles.english: Harmonies that we layer, draped in sparkle

subtitles.original: 歌い続けたいな
subtitles.english: I want to keep singing

subtitles.original: 踊り続けたいな
subtitles.english: I want to keep dancing

subtitles.original: そんな願い　わがままもいいでしょ？
subtitles.english: Is it okay to have such a selfish wish?

subtitles.original: だって楽しすぎて　もっと笑いたい
subtitles.english: Because it's so much fun, I want to laugh more

subtitles.original: 輝くステージで　もっともっとお願い　ずっと (Oh yeah!)
subtitles.english: On the shining stage, more and more, please, forever (Oh yeah!)

subtitles.original: 嬉しい楽しい　愛しいだけじゃ語れない
subtitles.english: I can't express it just with happy, fun, and dear

subtitles.original: 今も今も　悩みはあるけれど
subtitles.english: Even now, even now, I still have worries

subtitles.original: ここにいるよ私　ここにいるよ
subtitles.english: I am here, I am here

subtitles.original: 君と同じ世界を　見つめて (Ready!)
subtitles.english: Looking at the same world as you (Ready!)

subtitles.original: きらめきライター　生まれたてのドキドキを響かせよう
subtitles.english: Sparkling Writer, let the freshly born excitement resonate

subtitles.original: 最高の時間　最高の仲間と
subtitles.english: In the best time, with the best comrades

subtitles.original: ここにいるよ　見つけてくれたから
subtitles.english: I'm here, because you found me

subtitles.original: 君に会いたくてやってきたんだ　みんなで歌おう
subtitles.english: I came here because I wanted to see you, let's sing together

subtitles.original: 終わらないメロディー
subtitles.english: The unending melody

subtitles.original: きらめきに乗って
subtitles.english: Riding on the sparkle

subtitles.original: きらめき纏って (Yeah!)
subtitles.english: Draped in sparkle (Yeah!)

subtitles.original: アキ・ローゼンタール AKI ROSENTHAL
subtitles.english: AKI ROSENTHAL

subtitles.original: 不知火フレア SHIRANUI FLARE
subtitles.english: SHIRANUI FLARE

subtitles.original: 雪花ラミィ YUKIHANA LAMY
subtitles.english: YUKIHANA LAMY

subtitles.original: 2日目も昨日に負けないくらい盛り上がっていくよ！
subtitles.english: Day 2 will be just as exciting as yesterday!

subtitles.original: 幕張、みんなの声聞こえてるよ！
subtitles.english: Makuhari, I can hear everyone's voices!

subtitles.original: しっかりペンライト振って一緒に盛り上がろう！
subtitles.english: Wave your penlights hard and let's get excited together!

subtitles.original: 思い通りにいかないことだらけ
subtitles.english: Full of things that don't go as planned

subtitles.original: どうしようもなくて自己嫌悪
subtitles.english: Helpless and full of self-hatred

subtitles.original: 八百万の痛みや苦しみから　逃げ込める場所を探してる
subtitles.english: Searching for a place to escape from countless pains and sufferings

subtitles.original: 生き急いだ路の隙間に引きこもって
subtitles.english: Shutting myself away in the gaps of a path lived in haste

subtitles.original: 月も太陽も無視して眠ろう
subtitles.english: Ignoring the moon and the sun, let's sleep

subtitles.original: 生まれてきたことの意味なんて　知らない　分かんないよ
subtitles.english: The meaning of being born, I don't know, I don't understand

subtitles.original: でもそんな
subtitles.english: But such a...
